text: Pain Management: Competitor Analysis & Matrix. Strategy Document. 1. Competitive Landscape. Competing with NSAIDs and specialized muscle relaxants. 2. Head-to-Head Comparison. Advantage in speed and GI safety. Table 4: Competitor Matrix.

sections.heading: 1. Competitive Landscape
sections.content: Focuses on physical manifestations of pain vs traditional anti-inflammatories.

text: Sedation: Moderate vs None. Best For: Spasms vs Fever vs Anxiety. 3. Strategic Positioning: Body vs. Mind. Focus on physicality for Veldra. 4. Market Share Projection. Targeting 22% of back pain market.

sections.heading: 3. Strategic Positioning: Body vs. Mind
sections.content: Clarifies the sales angle: Veldra is for sharp, physical limits; Aetheris is for mental weight.

sections.heading: 4. Market Share Projection
sections.content: Aims for 22% capture of generic NSAID market share.
